Package it.polimi.ingsw.client

  • Interface Summary
    Interface Description
    Clickable
    object that can be clicked.
  • Class Summary
    Class Description
    AsciiFaithPath
    Generates a colored FaithPath using Ascii Art randomly assign a colored cross to each player
    CLI
    class that manages the input of the player when he is using the command line to play.
    Client
    This class represents a Client, it starts the View in GUI or CLI.
    GUI
    GUI class, created when a client starts the Client with "gui" argument
    RuntimeTypeAdapterFactory<T>
    This adapter implemented by GSON developers and taken from https://github.com/google/gson/blob/master/extras/src/main/java/com/google/gson/typeadapters/RuntimeTypeAdapterFactory.java allows to read polymorphic objects.
    Shape
    this class contains all the information of a displayable object.
    Welcome
    class used to welcome the player when he starts the cli game.
  • Enum Summary
    Enum Description
    Color
    color of development cards for the view.
    Marble
    marble of the market for the client.
    Resource
    enum representing resources to the client.
